meanings.sent1: The oolitic rocks were smooth and round.
meanings.sent2: The beach was covered in oolitic sand.
meanings.sent3: The oolitic stones rolled down the hill like marbles.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as oolitic as the pebbles on the shore.
meanings.sent5: The oolitic texture of the soil made it perfect for growing plants.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or resembling oolites.
meanings.sent1: The oolitic formations in the cave were fascinating.
meanings.sent2: Her necklace had an oolitic pattern that shimmered in the light.
meanings.sent3: The oolitic clouds in the sky looked like fluffy cotton balls.
meanings.sent4: His voice had an oolitic quality that was soothing to listen to.
meanings.sent5: The oolitic design on the wallpaper added a touch of elegance to the room.
